title: League Screensaver app stopped working.
body: Around the time of Warwick's release, the League Screensaver app stopped working, and it only shows a black screen instead of the animated splash artsin my list. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app, but it's still not working. Help?

replies.body: I am having this issue also. I have uninstalled reinstalled and submitted a support ticket where they where unable to fix it, I just want my screensaver back. Please help

The screen saver coming up as a black screen should be resolved by reinstalling it.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look individually to find out why this didn't work for you.  We'll get back to you!
